lines: 1. K'ebibe bir' ebiritoNchwo ase Nyasae;Keene nagotimokie,Koregen' Eng'ana.
Mwanche rioka,mwanche rioka,Mwanch' Ere bono,Nagokonye, nagokonye,'Gokonye bono.
2. Agaitera amanyinga,Tonyore ebisioBwetobek' amanyinga ime,orabe kegima.
4. Nchwo moso' as'omoganda,Mogende IgoroKomenya ense engiya,Mogoko botambe.
